00017 #include "MisrCoordQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrUnitConv.h"
00019 #include "MisrProjParam.h"
00020 #include <stddef.h>
00021 /* M_PI is not defined in math.h in Linux unless __USE_BSD is defined */
00022 /* and you can define it at the gcc command-line if -ansi is set */
00023 #ifndef __USE_BSD
00024 # define __USE_BSD
00025 #endif
00026 #include <math.h>
00027 
00041 MTKt_status MtkPathToProjParam(
00042   int path,              
00043   int resolution_meters, 
00044   MTKt_MisrProjParam *pp  )
00045 {
00046   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00047   MTKt_MisrProjParam pp_temp = MTKT_MISRPROJPARAM_INIT;
00048                 /* MISR projection parameters */
00049   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00050   double asclong;       /* Long of ascending node in dms */
00051   double lambda0;       /* Path 1 long of ascending node (radians) */
00052   double lambda;        /* Current path long of ascending node (rad) */
00053   int resolution;       /* Desired resolution */
00054   float resfactor;      /* Resolution scale factor */
00055   int i;            /* Loop index */
00056 
00057   if (pp == NULL)
00058     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00059 
00060   /* Use default resolution if NULL is passed */
00061   if (resolution_meters == 0)
00062     resolution = RESOLUTION;
00063   else
00064     resolution = resolution_meters;
00065 
00066   /* Check the bounds of path */
00067   if (path < 1 || path > NPATH)
00068     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00069 
00070   /* Compute resolution scale factor */
00071   resfactor = pp_temp.resolution / (float)resolution;
00072 
00073   /* Compute longitude of ascending node for this path from first path */
00074   status = MtkDmsToRad(PP5_ASCLONG, &lambda0);
00075   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00076 
00077   lambda = lambda0 - (2.0 * M_PI / NPATH) * (path - 1);
00078 
00079   status = MtkRadToDms(lambda, &asclong);
00080   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00081 
00082   /* Set path and resolution dependent projection parameters. */
00083   pp_temp.path = path;
00084   pp_temp.projparam[4] = asclong;
00085   pp_temp.nline = (int)(pp_temp.nline * resfactor);
00086   pp_temp.nsample = (int)(pp_temp.nsample * resfactor);
00087   pp_temp.resolution = resolution;
00088 
00089   for (i = 0; i < NBLOCK - 2; i++) {
00090     pp_temp.reloffset[i] *= resfactor;
00091   }
00092 
00093   *pp = pp_temp;
00094 
00095   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00096 
00097 ERROR_HANDLE:
00098   return status_code;
00099 }
